Reviews.Title: Great product!!!
Reviews.Author: Thiago
Reviews.Content: I needed one that have two sim cards, and I bought this one. For me it's perfect. It's unloked, have a good signal quality and the internet it's perfect. I spend many days looking for a good cel phone with two sim cards, and this it's the one.

Reviews.Title: Great phone at a great price
Reviews.Author: Virgil Sealy
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone for the money. It's not as expensive as an S4 but the experience is good. I love the size of the phone and the screen size. It's perfect for watching videos and surfing the net when you are out.

Reviews.Title: the phone is great
Reviews.Author: TabletR.D. "Jose Walder"
Reviews.Content: I buy and recommend. good price and arrived on time.the phone is great, works very well, is very fast, the colors are magnificent and have a very updated version of android
